nodes.text: A book-like piece of technology that could display videos was used by the young Wookiee Lumpawarrump in 1.5 ABY. He watched a cartoon about the exploits of his father, Chewbacca, on the video book, but switched the screen to instead display a simple game when a curious Imperial commander came to investigate.
While referred to as a video book in The Star Wars Holiday Special's script, the item has not been named in canon.
